song.title: Astoria School
song.info:
The theme of the movie Kindergarten Cop.
A comedy in which the tough cop John Kimble (Arnold Schwarzenegger) the toughest assignment of his career will: pose as a kindergarten worker order durgsdealer and murderers.
Original music by: Randy Edelman
* Comments taken from his website (http://www.ronklaren.nl/music/meer-muziek/)
